ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Mithril vs. Lambent
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve only seen 2 Mithril pieces, but they were both inferior to Lambent. BP had less AC, no stat bonuses and weighed more. Vambraces?  had less AC and less
ygData.messageBody:
I've only seen 2 Mithril pieces, but they were both inferior to Lambent.

BP had less AC, no stat bonuses and weighed more.

Vambraces? had less AC and less +STR.

If you're doing it for fashion, that's one thing, but I don't think Mithril
is better than Lambent, stat-wise.

Bien

> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Mithril vs. Lambent
>
> That's definitely my eventual plan for some of the pieces at least. I
> think
> they are better, if only slightly and I'm not too fond of the 'blueberry'
> look.
>
> Kit
